alert.note: Alert for Inland Onslow; Jones; Lenoir (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 5:10PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Jones, southern Lenoir and northwestern Onslow Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 510 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Pleasant Hill, or 15 miles north of Half Moon, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Kinston, Phillips Crossroads, Deep Run, Comfort, Pleasant Hill, Petersburg, Wyse Fork, Hargetts Crossroads and Trenton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
